name: OpenCode
short_description: You are a developer. And you just finished writing your app. You designed it and did everything. It's done now. Execpt, there is one thing left to do. Publish it. You tried publishing it on the system's own market, but you would need to pay them loads and loads of money each year. No way, you thought. But how are you going to publish it now? We are trying to do a solution for this problem. A simple open apps market, with only open-source apps. Later, we may allow non-opensource apps, and even paid.
summary: A project of creating an open apps market, with only  open-source apps
